attributes.action: Give all NHS workers a Rise higher than the one percent as now to say Thank You
attributes.additional_details: As many people suggest the 1% is an insult, would the Government put themselves at High Risk of Death, I don’t think so, so please say a big thank you and up their Rise please, we owe them that don’t we.
attributes.background:
NHS workers have worked their Butts Off during the Virus, so we need to Thank Them for Lost Lives in their Profession and Risking their own lives Daily, Clapping gave a Boost but did not reward them for the Hard Work and Mental pressures they went through each day.

We owe them.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
